response.original_title: Accumulations ou « Le monde le plus beau est comme un tas d’ordures répandues au hasard »
response.overview: Unpacking a drawer, with its heterogeneous contents, of a secretary in an office, relentless repetition of the words "My name is Didier Ozil" illustrated by the images on the wall of his apartment, tailing consumers on a Saturday afternoon in the streets of Lyon, and the overflowing of garbage cans on the sidewalks of the city center.
response.title: Accumulations ou « Le monde le plus beau est comme un tas d’ordures répandues au hasard »
